snippet.title: Glitch Dungeon Crystal: Babushka's Quest - Gameplay Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Welcome, babushka. Take on the role of an ornery but sweet little old lady and descend into a strange dungeon. 

Learn colorful spells, solve mind-bending puzzles, or just hit stuff with your broom.

The only way to stop the decay of the world is by tidying up.

A comfy metroidvania coming Halloween(ish) 2024!

wishlist here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1876850/Glitch_Dungeon_Crystal/

find me at: https://jakeonaut.github.io/

#retro #pixelart #indiegame #babushka #glitch #gaming #
